updated_cases.title: Time based policy with No End time selection
updated_cases.custom_summary: Time based policy with no end time selection
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create a time-based policy with time range and start time selected, with action = block, app=Box
2. Access box.com
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. Box app should be blocked based on start time selection for infinite end time.

updated_cases.title: Daily interval time based policy
updated_cases.custom_summary: Create Daily type time interval policy
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. Box should be blocked for daily 8 am to 6 pm user local time.

updated_cases.title: Validate weekly interval with days_of_wk list in time_profile.json
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate weekly interval with days_of_wk list in time_profile.json
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. Box site should be blocked for time interval match.

updated_cases.title: Validate time duration attribute time range with start and end time range and policy hit
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate time duration attribute in ui_inline_policy_ver3.xml
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create a time based policy for application = box, and select valid time range with start and end time range
2. Save the policy
3. Validate policy_v2.json
4. Access box.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. policy_v2.json should have correct time duration attributes as selected by user while creating policy
2. Policy hit should work as expected and blocked the site

updated_cases.title: Validate policy evaluation for app type == category policy
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate policy evaluation for app type == category policy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create an inline policy with category=Cloud Storage, activities=Upload, Download, Action=Block
2. Select different combinations of time range and intervals
3. Perform login, upload and download activities on box
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Login to box should be successful
2. Upload and download should be blocked for the given time range and interval
3. Upload and download should not be blocked for the time range and interval outside which policy mentions
4. Application and page events should be generated for these activities

updated_cases.title: Validate policy evaluation for app type == application policy
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate policy evaluation for app type == application policy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create an inline policy with application=box, activities=Upload, Download, Action=Block
2. Select different combinations of time range and intervals
3. Perform login, upload and download activities on box
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Login to box should be successful
2. Upload and download should be blocked for the given time range and interval
3. Upload and download should not be blocked for the time range and interval outside which policy mentions
4. Application and page events should be generated for these activities

updated_cases.title: Validate policy is not evaluated for user not present in the specified time range and interval
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate policy is not evaluated for user not present in the specified time range and interval
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create an inline policy with category=Cloud Storage, activities=Upload, Download, Action=Block
2. Select different combinations of time range and intervals
3. Perform login, upload and download activities on box from a remote machine in FR4 region
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Login to box should be successful
2. Upload and download should be not be blocked for the given time range and interval
3. Application and page events should be generated for these activities

updated_cases.title: Validate start_time and end_time are not sent when "All Day" toggle switch is turned ON
updated_cases.custom_summary: Validate start_time and end_time are not sent when "All Day" toggle switch is turned ON
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create an inline policy with category=Cloud Storage, activities=Upload, Download, Action=Block
2. Select different combinations of time range and intervals - 5 days a week from 9am-5pm
3. Perform login, upload and download activities on box
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Login to box should be successful
2. Upload and download should be blocked for the given time range but for all day
3. Make sure that start_time and end_time are not evaluated in this case
4. Upload and download should not be blocked for the time range and interval outside which policy mentions
5. Application and page events should be generated for these activities

updated_cases.title: Validate src-match for web Access policy
updated_cases.custom_steps: Create a web access policy with User = Group A Exclusion = Group B, User20
updated_cases.custom_expected: The users matched will be User11 through User19

updated_cases.title: Validate src-match for DLP policy
updated_cases.custom_steps: Create a DLP policy with User = Group A Exclusion = Group B, User20
updated_cases.custom_expected: The users matched will be User11 through User19
